html.p: Anything you surround in <a> tags will be incorporated into the dictionary as a link. Not just the term that you surround, but any other place that it exists. Clicking on a term will enable the concordance for that term.

Here is a test. If I put the phrase "superior automatic dictionary" in this paragraph and post this post, then it should show up in the concordance. On doc out that should become a link that will activate the concordance for that phrase. Means that not all occurrences of a term will be auto-clickable, but at least they'll be part of the concordance inventory... hm there's something missing though if we can't have the entire.
